funcionalidad_btn: Need help with the page functionality?
registro_local_btn: How to add your business to our page?
infpage_general: When you enter the page, you will see the main screen where you can view the businesses located in the university's pedestrian area. You can browse freely, check reviews of the businesses to see the quality of the place and prices. If you want to comment, rate a business, or mark it as a favorite, you need to create a user account by clicking the 'Sign up' button. If you already have an account, you can log in using the buttons in the menu displayed when you click on your profile icon. Once logged in, you can comment or mark your preferred business as a favorite. Remember to be respectful and cautious with your comments. Do you want to register your business? Go to the support section and select 'How to add your business to our page?' to find the form. Follow the steps, and once the information is verified, your business will appear on our page.
local_descripcion_general: The perfect place to enjoy the best dishes at the university.
reporte_nota_general: NOTE: Once the information is sent, we will investigate the person or business and contact you when we have results.
ingresar_local_general: If you want to register your business, please fill out the form with the necessary information. Once the data is received, we will verify its accuracy and contact you when we have a response.
ingresar_correo_general: If you leave this field empty, the email you provided will be used.
estadisticas_descripcion_calificacion: Average rating from the business's reviews.
estadisticas_descripcion_favoritos: Number of users who marked the business as a favorite.
estadisticas_descripcion_vistas: Number of users who viewed the business this month.
estadisticas_descripcion_reseñas: Number of reviews for the business since its creation.
retirar_local_general: We are sorry for this loss :(, but don't worry. Enter the name of the business, the reason for its removal, and we will contact you once the action has been completed.
baneo_nota_general: NOTE: If you don't provide a valid justification, the ticket might be for you!
login_registrarse: Don't have an account? Sign up
registrar_iniciar_sesion: Already have an account? Log in
